label.phrase: and so the lion fell in love with the lamb

clusterList.phrase: and so the lion fell in love with the lamb

there was such trust between today christian's former owners had been told the lion wouldn't recognize them but the video shows the lion's obvious joy at being reunited with the two men us and such love he ran toward us with such love and excitement in his eyes and we felt exactly the same way we were just so excited to see him looking so big and healthy the story had just turned out so beautifully when it could have had a very different ending
